description.value: Data Models representing the data structures and requirements for interoperability.
PlanDefinitions defining the service endpoints for using the PSS. These have the inputs and outputs represented by the profiles
These define constraints on FHIR resources for systems conforming to this implementation guide
These define additional elements that can be exchanged with the respective FHIR resources

PSS anonymised Patient
PSS Bundle Tags - Feedback, Recommendation
Consent statement about using PSS and agreeing with (or opting out of) the Terms and Conditions.
The PSS Data Acquisition Form is used to inform what data needs to be acquired and provided to the PSS system.
Exception codes for Patient Summary (PSS) processing.
ValueSet including exception codes for Patient Summary (PSS).
Feedback containing the acceptance of the PSS results.
Feedback code reasons for PSS
Feedback codes for PSS
Feedback codes for PSS
Operation to provide feedback on PSS suggestions
Task to collect feedback on PSS suggestions
PSS MedicationRequest - using anonymised patient
CapabilityStatement for PSS provider systems.
PSS Task for Questionnaire - using anonymised patient
A clinician-friendly rating, or score, for the recommendation; patient-friendly if the recommendation is patient-facing.
The approximate, relevant age of the patient at the time of the search.
A request for PSS (Prescriber Support System) results.
The PSS Request Data Bundle is used to request data from the PSS system.
A response containing the results from the PSS.
The PSS Response Bundle is used to return data from the PSS system.
The PSS Response Bundle is used to return data from the PSS system.
All PSS responses contain a PSS Communication Request conformant to this profile.
The PSS Response Medication Request is used when the PSS system returns a MedicationRequest
All PSS responses contain a PSS RequestGroup conformant to this profile.
The PSS Response Service Request is used when the PSS system returns a ServiceRequest
Condition codes from the QSI system
Procedure codes from the QSI system
